attributes.action: address uncovered aspects of cot death - as part of the sudden infant (explained) death programme in neonates look at soap powders and recommendations on covers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The tragic case of Sally Clark, the innocent mother falsely accused of killing her two children shows how tentative life and death issues are - to improve what information materials midwives already have, the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to address the feasibility of soft furnishings, such as cot covers and teddy bears. 
Please also better inform the public on potential allergens in soap powders and give first aid advice / dealing with newborn infections.

Thank you.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
